subject: RE: Test Coverage Analysis Tool For Junit
msgSnippet: The newest version of Test Mentor adds method coverage metrics and the ability to run JUnit tests. More info about Test Mentor and JUnit at:
messageBody:
The newest version of Test Mentor adds method coverage metrics and the
ability to run JUnit tests.

More info about Test Mentor and JUnit at:
http://www.javatesting.com/documentation/stmjunit.pdf
